Package TicketPackage.ApplicationPackage

Class TicketBookingSystem

java.lang.Object
TicketPackage.ApplicationPackage.TicketBookingSystem
public class TicketBookingSystem
extends java.lang.Object
This is the main class which runs our Ticket Booking system
Author:
Melissa Melaugh, Ciaran O'Boyle, Michelle Loughran Created on: 25/11/2020 Updated on: 08/12/2020 AirportCheckIn:TicketPackage.ApplicationPackage:TicketBookingSystem

    • getTravelDate

      private static Plane getTravelDate()
      This method is responsible for getting the month and day from the user and return the plane for that day/month
      Returns:
      A plane object for the day/month that the user is looking to travel on

    • getPassengerInfo

      private static java.lang.String[] getPassengerInfo​(Plane plane)
      This method is responsible for getting the basic passenger information and returning it
      Parameters:
      plane - the plane that the passenger intends to travel on
      Returns:
      a list of information about the passenger [first name, last name, seat, departure date]

    • buyTickets
